overview: Surf Nastys is a C.R. Sarge and Shorty spew-rama of HB crew charging the edges as surfers of the universe. A collage of Phil Sheppard's Sultans of Speed Trilogy puts the 90's in perspective. And the whole lot lets loose Taman Shud, Sean Kelly and Mooseheads with a pumping, thumping soundtrack.
title: Surf Nastys
